A wall mounted picture frame in a bespoke design . Our meet the staff photo boards can be produced to any size and shape required. They are available in a wide range of materials/finishes including acrylic, brushed aluminium and brushed black aluminium Our Meet the Staff Photo Boards are designed to be completely unique for your business, organisation or school. Also available are Meet and Greet Photo Board with Optional IN / OUT sliders to show which members of staff are available. An optional extra, easily removed, clear acrylic security cover covers the whole board to stop anyone tampering with the photos. This can be quickly and easily removed to enable easy changing of photos. Photo Pockets/Photographs The clear photo pockets, which are available in any size you require, allow the photos to be easily changed without removing the frame from the wall. We also produce the staff photos to be inserted with the staff members name and job title printed on. If any staff change, simply let us know the changes and we will produce a new photo for you to insert. Delivery/Installation Our Meet and Greet Photo Boards are supplied with all fixtures and fittings including aluminium stand off mounts to give a 3D effect. A drilling template is also supplied to make fitting very easy. We ship to the United States, Canada, the UK and any other country in the world Price/Contact If you require a quote or just want to chat about your requirements, please either fill in the Contact Form. email us us on info@bdpcreative.co.uk or phone us on  (+44) 01257 278289 for a no obligation quote.
